name: Jam Packed Christmas
description:
More details will follow, but you are indeed the merry Kris Kringle, the king of Christmas, the finnish phantom - Santa Claus himself.

It is Christmas Eve and you have an important mission - deliver presents to the ones that need it the most.

Follow the light from Rudolph's nose - let it guide your way!

Use WASD to steer Rudolph, the red-nosed reindeer and just fly over the houses that have yet to receive their christmas presents. When they have, they will light their christmas lights from happiness.

But it is a sinister time, and all will perhaps not be as easy as it seems. Watch out!
